name: pipelines
desc: manage collections of apps in pipelines

subcommands.name: pipelines:add PIPELINE
subcommands.desc: add this app to a pipeline

subcommands.name: pipelines:diff
subcommands.desc: compares the latest release of this app its downstream app(s)

subcommands.name: pipelines:info PIPELINE
subcommands.desc: show list of apps in a pipeline

subcommands.name: pipelines:list
subcommands.desc: list pipelines you have access to

subcommands.name: pipelines:promote
subcommands.desc: promote the latest release of this app to its downstream app(s)

subcommands.name: pipelines:remove
subcommands.desc: remove this app from its pipeline

subcommands.name: pipelines:update
subcommands.desc: update this app's stage in a pipeline
